query: SELECT `trigger`, COUNT(*) as count FROM automations WHERE personalId = 1 GROUP BY `trigger` HAVING count > 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT `trigger`, COUNT(*) as count FROM automations WHERE personalId = 1 GROUP BY `trigger` HAVING count > 1;
